typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string[] (['a','b','c'])
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movies1
source(output(
		newcolumn as string,
		prevcolumn as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	fileName: 'nulls.json',
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> columnmappings
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movies2
movies1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(position==1),
			$parameter1[1] = $$),
		each(match(position==2),
			$parameter1[2] = $$),
		each(match(position==3),
			$parameter1[3] = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
movies2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!isNull(sink2#lookup(name).prevcolumn)),
			sink2#lookup($$).newcolumn = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
columnmappings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['prevcolumn'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
